title: Create a fixed-width column using format()
description: Use format() with width specifiers to align text in terminal‑style output. This is especially helpful when using collect() with groupBy() to produce readable tabular summaries.

examples.name: Example
examples.description: Pads the severity field to a fixed width and appends detectionName so all detections line up nicely in a single formatted column.
examples.query:
#kind=Primary
| eventType=K8SDetectionEvent
| detection := format("%-18s %s", field=[severity, detectionName])
| groupBy(resourceName, function=[collect([detection, clusterName]), count(as="TotalEvents")])
